SELECT contents_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO contents(contentsno, bookno, memberno, title, content, recom, word, rdate, file1,file1saved,thumb1,size1,price,saleprice,dc,point,writer,publisher) VALUES(contents_seq.nextval, #{bookno}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content},#{recom},#{word},sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1},#{price},#{saleprice},#{dc},#{point},#{writer},#{publisher})
